name: North End Grill's Bloody Lager
description: Think of a Michelada if you need help understanding this one: it's a beer cocktail made with a light lager. They add fattiness to the drink with a long, crisp slice of applewood smoked bacon.
recipeIngredient: 20 ounces North End Grill Bloody Mary Mix

recipeInstructions.text: Fill four glasses with ice. Divide beer between glasses. Add bloody mary mix and stir gently to combine. Garnish with bacon and lemon.
